page.title: 14VILLAGE CRICKET
page.content: In the summer,weekends are busy for my family.We go to the cricket pitch at Windrush.The pitch is in a field with trees near by. My mum prepares the tea for the teams.My brother and dad both play cricket for Windrush cricket club.I usually help by putting scores on the score board and helping mum with the tea.We prepare the tea at home, and make it ready at the cricket pitch.We usually make cakes and sandwiches, and drink orange or cups of tea.Sometimes my friend Donna, who lives in Windrush, comes to the cricket pitch and prepares the tea with us.When we have finished we go to the nearby river to fish for minnows.After the teams have had their tea, we have ours.Then we go wandering in the fields.When we get back the match has finished.We call at 'The Fox Inn',before we go home.
